title: Mauy Thai Lee Sin Sale?
body: When will be skin of Lee Sin(Mauy Thai) on sale?

replies.body:
You're in luck, it looks like Muay Thai Lee Sin should be on sale sometime next month, according to our [**January Sales Schedule**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/january-sales-schedule-0). I don't have an exact date, but keep an eye on the [**Sales Page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) for more info!

Let me know if you have any questions.
